item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Peter Sheahan
item.description: "A satisfied need no longer motivates." -- Peter Sheahan

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Peter Sheahan
item.description: "Think AND not OR" -- Peter Sheahan

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Samuel Taylor Coleridge
item.description: "Language is the armory of the human mind, and at once contains the trophies of its past and the weapons of its future conquests." -- Samuel Taylor Coleridge

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "These woods are lovely, dark and deep, But I have promises to keep, And miles to go before I sleep, And miles to go before I sleep." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "Only a mediocre person is always at his best. " -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Frederick Douglass
item.description: "It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men." -- Frederick Douglass

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Doris Lessing
item.description: "I am sure everyone has had the experience of reading a book and finding it vibrating with aliveness, with colour and immediacy. And then, perhaps some weeks later, reading it again and finding it flat and empty. Well, the book hasn't changed: you have." -- Doris Lessing

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Anne Brontë
item.description: "All our talents increase in the using, and every faculty, both good and bad, strengthens by exercise." -- Anne Brontë

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Goethe, Schiller, Hebel, et al
item.description: "Talent develops in solitude, character develops in the stream of life." -- Goethe, Schiller, Hebel, et al

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Robert Benchley
item.description: "It took me fifteen years to discover that I had no talent for writing, but I couldn't give it up because by that time I was too famous." -- Robert Benchley

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Larry McMurtry
item.description: "If you wait, all that happens is that you get older." -- Larry McMurtry

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Rick Gekoski
item.description: "To look at those (few) books in the dawning recognition that what they furnish is not a room, but a self." -- Rick Gekoski

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Rick Gekoski
item.description: "You can't simply put a book down or away." -- Rick Gekoski

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Rick Gekoski
item.description: "Reading is how we learn to attach ourselves to ourselves, and to others, and to the world: reading inhabits us with the tendrils of love." -- Rick Gekoski

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Jennifer Egan
item.description: "I'm always happy," Sasha said. "Sometimes I just forget." -- Jennifer Egan

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "History dressed up in the glow of love’s kiss turned grief into beauty." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "Oh what a wonderful soul so bright inside you. Got power to heal the sun’s broken heart, power to restore the moon’s vision too." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Aberjhani
item.description: "A bridge of silver wings stretches from the dead ashes of an unforgiving nightmare to the jeweled vision of a life started anew." -- Aberjhani

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Sholem Aleichem
item.description: "Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor." -- Sholem Aleichem

item.title: Jennifer (JC-S) add a quote by Ralph Ellison
item.description: "Life is to be lived, not controlled; and humanity is won by continuing to play in face of certain defeat." -- Ralph Ellison
